bonus.value: If HP is less than 30% after being attacked, gain a shield equal to 20%/26%/32%/40% of Max HP for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds.
Restore HP equal to 60%/75%/90%/105% of damage dealt while the shield is active. HP regained every 0.5 seconds cannot exceed 105%/127.5%/150%/172.5% of ATK.
